name: sns2hipchat
description: Simple AWS/SNS HTTP{S} endpoint relay to HipChat

HIPCHAT_TOKEN.description: The API auth token for your HipChat account

HIPCHAT_ROOM.description: The HipChat room to send messages to

HIPCHAT_FROM.description: The HipChat sender messages come from when using hipchat api v1

HIPCHAT_NOTIFY.description: Tell HipChat to notify people on sending messages

DEBUG.description: Verbose logging for debugging SNS and hipchat errors
